籤詩版本二:
Noi mai ka cone o ka mauʻu i punawai, ʻo ia ka mea paʻakikī loa e ʻimi i ka hana nui.
I kekahi manawa, hui koke au me koʻu hoa aloha a hele i ka lani me ka lima lima.
詩意:
Ke ʻimi nei kēia ʻāina cone hexagram i ke kiʻi o kahi puna.
Paʻakikī nā mea a pau ma mua o ka maʻalahi ma hope.
解曰: Nā makemake a me nā manaʻo. Loaʻa ke Komohana. ʻOi aku ka maikaʻi ʻaʻole e neʻe. Aia kahi wahi e loaʻa ai.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hui ʻo Liu Chen me ka make ʻole
I ka moʻokūʻauhau Han Hikina, hele ʻo Liu Chen lāua ʻo Ruan Zhaoguo i ke kuahiwi e ʻohi i nā mea kanu a hālāwai me ʻelua mau fairies.
Ua male lāua i ka fairy a hoʻi i ka home i ka hapalua makahiki ma hope mai, ʻaʻole lākou i ʻike he haneli mau makahiki i hala mai ko lāua hoʻi ʻana i ka home.
ʻAʻohe mea i ʻike iā lākou, no laila, hoʻi lākou i ke kuahiwi e ʻimi i ka fairy, ʻaʻole i loaʻa.
聖意: E pule no nā pōmaikaʻi ma kou home a me kou home, no kou pono ponoʻī, no ka loaʻa kālā, no nā kālepa, no ka male ʻana, no ka palekana ma Liujia, no ka poʻe ma Chitian, kanu mua i nā enuhe silika, no ka pōʻino holoholona, ​​​​no ka loaʻa ʻana o nā kānaka, no ka lehulehu. ka hihia, no ka neʻe ʻana, no ka waiwai nalowale, no ka maʻi, no ka laki maikaʻi ma nā ilina o Xingxing Mountain,
古人: Hui ʻo Liu Chen me ka make ʻole
